seo.title: Refer a friend
seo.description: Share Quilliams Gardening with someone you care about — you both get a reward when they book.

hero.heading: Refer a friend
hero.subheading: Send a referral in under a minute. If they book, you both get a reward on your next visit.

offer.headline: You both get 20% off your next visit
offer.description: When your friend books their first service, we’ll send you both a voucher to use on a future visit.
offer.terms: Referral reward applies when the referred customer completes their first paid booking. One voucher per household per referral. Vouchers can’t be combined with other offers.

formCopy.privacyNote: We’ll only use these details to follow up about the referral. This form does not automatically email your friend yet.
formCopy.successMessage: Thanks — your referral is saved. Keep this code safe; we’ll apply the reward when the referred booking is confirmed.
